Class Interpolator

java.lang.Object
dev.bjdelacruz.commons.utils.math.Interpolator
public final class Interpolator extends Object
A utility class that contains methods for performing linear interpolation.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Point<Number,Number>
    interpolate(Point<Number,Number> left, Point<Number,Number> right, Number x)
    Interpolates a point using the linear interpolation formula:

    Y = left_y + ((X - left_x) * (right_y - left_y) / (right_x - left_x))

    where Y is an interpolated value at X.
    static List<Point<Number,Number>>
    interpolate(List<Point<Number,Number>> points)
    Interpolates all the points in the given list that are between pairs of points that contain a value for Y.
    static List<Point<Number,Number>>
    mergeAndInterpolate(List<List<Point<Number,Number>>> lists)
    Merges multiple lists together and then interpolates all the missing points in the merged list.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • interpolate

      public static Point<Number,Number> interpolate(Point<Number,Number> left, Point<Number,Number> right, Number x)
      Interpolates a point using the linear interpolation formula:

      Y = left_y + ((X - left_x) * (right_y - left_y) / (right_x - left_x))

      where Y is an interpolated value at X.
      Parameters:
      left - The left data point (left_x, left_y).
      right - The right data point (right_x, right_y).
      x - The value used to calculate Y.
      Returns:
      A Point with an interpolated value for Y.

    • interpolate

      public static List<Point<Number,Number>> interpolate(List<Point<Number,Number>> points)
      Interpolates all the points in the given list that are between pairs of points that contain a value for Y.

      If the list contains fewer than two points that contain a value for Y, then the original list is returned.
      Parameters:
      points - A list of Point objects.
      Returns:
      A list of Point objects with interpolated values for Y.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the list contains duplicate values for X.

    • mergeAndInterpolate

      public static List<Point<Number,Number>> mergeAndInterpolate(List<List<Point<Number,Number>>> lists)
      Merges multiple lists together and then interpolates all the missing points in the merged list.
      Parameters:
      lists - A list of lists of Point objects.
      Returns:
      A list of Point objects containing all the points from both lists.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the merged list contains duplicate values for X.
